originalText.text: Tickets for repairs  get closed without anybody coming for repairs.   This year the annual review was to be filled out online,  but no confirmation of the annual review is given after submitting.   And no where in the application there is instructions on how to send proof of income.   Then they send letter asking to bring in the proof of income or termination procedures will commence.   Why are you threatening us?   It was your mistake to overlook how to show proof of income.   Bad enough I'm living in hazardous conditions for a human, but then the threats.   Can't stand living here any longer.   I want my transfer,  which they refuse to give me.

originalText.text:
My family received a letter from the Baruch management office THREATENING to terminate our lease because according to the incompetent fools there we have more than 2 air conditioners in our apartment. NYCHA cannot legally accuse someone of breach of contract when their claim is simply untrue.
We've contacted housing through the years for needed repairs in our apartment and it takes them YEARS to respond or even to just come take a look, but they're swift to make bogus claims against their tenants.
I will be reporting our current living conditions to the local media as well as your threatening letter. This cannot go on, NYCHA needs to get their act together.

originalText.text: Horrible , they lose paperwork and have little to no concern about each person’s case. The receptionist ignores people many times and offers advise that isn’t her’s to give. Misleading the tenants on things she doesn’t know . It’s torture trying to get anything done .

originalText.text: I  have yet to receive a new stove I have no idea who to go who to talk to too, I am suppose to rely on my housing assistant she literally just brush's everything away its been a week since they have gave us a hot plate (Which is broken ) to replace the our stove  (temporarily) also our old stove is still sitting in our apartment , and the lovely lady Anne at the window is always just sitting down telling me false information and laughing about my situation continuously in my face I just do not understand I really do not

originalText.text: I handed in the application 6 months again, no ones works on it, they even lose it,  I need to resubmitted again, and until now, they still not input my info to the computer.
